message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the propagation of malware in mobile networks, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a formal framework for deriving optimal patching policies, which involves modeling the spread of malware in the network (cs.SI). The paper uses Pontryagin's Maximum Principle for a stratified epidemic model, which is a mathematical optimization technique (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the clustering of malware in the network structure, which is a topic related to complex systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses numerical simulations to investigate the behavior of optimal patching policies, which involves analyzing data and algorithms (cs.DS).
